sys_script_include.name: Populate_Price_in_Order

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_d3db95f4c3868290d439563ed4013195
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1386762_sales_cr.Populate_Price_in_Order</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>Populate_Price_in_Order</name><script><![CDATA[var Populate_Price_in_Order = Class.create();
Populate_Price_in_Order.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    populatePrice: function() {

        var productItemSysId = this.getParameter('productItemSysId');

        var gr = new GlideRecord('x_1386762_sales_cr_product_items');
        gr.addEncodedQuery('sys_idSTARTSWITH' + productItemSysId);
        gr.query();

        var information = {};

        while (gr.next()) {
            information.productPrice = gr.u_itemprice.toString();
            information.productDesc = gr.u_prodesc.toString();
        }

        return JSON.stringify(information);



    },

    type: 'Populate_Price_in_Order'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-06 05:11:13</sys_created_on><sys_id>d3db95f4c3868290d439563ed4013195</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Populate_Price_in_Order</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Sales CRM Application" source="x_1386762_sales_cr">7a81ea53c32d8610d439563ed4013156</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Sales CRM Application">7a81ea53c32d8610d439563ed4013156</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_d3db95f4c3868290d439563ed4013195</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-06 05:11:13</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
